title: The Magic fiddle
creator_credit: Norway. Ministry of Education, Jon Mathisen and Michael Forlong
brief_description: A Norwegian ballet based on one of the old folk tales of Norway. A peasant boy gives away his last shilling to a beggar who turns into a magician and gives him a magic fiddle which, when played, makes everyone dance. Features the Norwegian Ballet and the choreography of Gerd Kjolaas.
